item.title: Has Craig Wright proved he's Bitcoin's Satoshi Nakamoto? - BBC News
item.description:
Has Craig Wright proved he's Bitcoin's Satoshi Nakamoto? - BBC News

Scepticism has greeted a claim by Craig Wright that he is the inventor of Bitcoin. His claim has been subjected to scrutiny on social media, discussion forums and message boards. Many say the evidence has been found wanting. On 2 May, Australian entrepreneur Craig Wright publicly claimed to be the creator of the Bitcoin virtual currency.

item.title: IBM Announces Security Focused Blockchain Framework - NEWSBTC
item.description:
IBM Announces Security Focused Blockchain Framework - NEWSBTC

IBM's new blockchain technology framework and cloud services focus on the security aspects of blockchain deployment for regulated industries, addressing any concerns regarding its integrity. IBM recently announced its new blockchain framework and cloud supporting services. The tech pioneer has been making some really good progress in the blockchain technology segment in the recent days.

item.title: What's Encouraging Blockchain R&D? Barclays, Citi and More Weigh In - CoinDesk
item.description:
What's Encouraging Blockchain R&D? Barclays, Citi and More Weigh In - CoinDesk

Large financial institutions missed the boat with the Internet and don't intend on making that same mistake again with the blockchain, panelists at Consensus 2016's "Internal Approaches for Blockchain Strategies" panel agreed today. Yet, while they are definitely thinking about long-term implementations within their organizations, their focus is, by and large, on short term victories.

item.title: Craig Wright Is Not Satoshi Nakamoto - the Technical Proof
item.description:
Craig Wright Is Not Satoshi Nakamoto - the Technical Proof

Craig Wright has failed to prove that he is Bitcoin's creator, Satoshi Nakamoto. This article will explain technical facts that show how Craig Wright has not offered any conclusive evidence that he is Satoshi Nakamoto. Furthermore, Craig Wright's self-published verification script reveals the he had played a clever deception, but had not been smart enough to hide it from even cursory technical scrutiny.

item.title: Australia emerges as global leader in bitcoin, blockchain technology
item.description:
Australia emerges as global leader in bitcoin, blockchain technology

While the news of Craig Wright has taken the world by storm, other recent developments prove that Australia is a world leader among blockchain technology and bitcoin. The Australian federal governm...

item.title: Taxes Claim Half Prince's Estate: He Should Have Left Bitcoin Behind
item.description:
Taxes Claim Half Prince's Estate: He Should Have Left Bitcoin Behind

Prince, the beloved, recently departed pop star, may have up to half of his estate go to the government. He could have avoided losing much of his financial legacy by using Bitcoin instead. The highly prolific musician died last month, but unfortunately passed away without leaving a known will.

item.title: Craig Wright to 'Move' Bitcoin to Prove He Is Satoshi Nakamoto
item.description:
Craig Wright to 'Move' Bitcoin to Prove He Is Satoshi Nakamoto

Craig Wright began the week trying to convince the world that he was Bitcoin's creator, the pseudonymous Satoshi Nakamoto. Scrutiny of his claims and evidence duly followed before skepticism took over with programmers and members of the bitcoin core development team poking holes in the evidence produced.

item.title: Shoot for the Moon or Take It Slow? Tech Giants Talk Blockchain - CoinDesk
item.description:
Shoot for the Moon or Take It Slow? Tech Giants Talk Blockchain - CoinDesk

Three massive tech companies and one of the most heavily funded startups in blockchain today debated the merits of deploying blockchain technology incrementally or going after moonshots with the power to shift entire industry paradigms. Speaking on stage at this year's Consensus 2016 conference in New York City, executives representing more than $571bn of market capitalization and $76m in venture capital engaged in a linguistic dual over which path was best, with the occasional point of agreement.

item.title: The Bitcoin affair: Craig Wright 'to move' Satoshi coin - BBC News
item.description:
The Bitcoin affair: Craig Wright 'to move' Satoshi coin - BBC News

The man who has identified himself as the creator of Bitcoin plans to provide further proof to his claim. Craig Wright's spokesman told the BBC that he would "move a coin from an early block" belonging to the crypto-currency's inventor "in the coming days".

item.title: Who created bitcoin? Craig Wright, Satoshi Nakamoto mystery still not solved
item.description:
Who created bitcoin? Craig Wright, Satoshi Nakamoto mystery still not solved

SAN FRANCISCO -- Who is Satoshi Nakamoto? For many in the tech world, the identity of bitcoin's elusive creator has been a long-running parlor game. And the speculation might not be over. Australian entrepreneur Craig Steven Wright, who announced Monday that he founded the digital currency , convinced at least one longtime bitcoin contributor that he's the real deal.
